metadata.title: CVE-2021-46339 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: There is an Assertion 'lit_is_valid_cesu8_string (string_p, string_size)' failed at /base/ecma-helpers-string.c(ecma_new_ecma_string_from_utf8) in JerryScript 3.0.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
